name: flammability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability of something to burn easily: The flammability of the material means that its use in any part of the aircraft has been banned. Because of the liquid's high flammability rating, it must be stored extremely carefully.
More examplesFewer examplesFollowing a number of deaths, regulations were introduced regarding the flammability of foam used in furniture.It was found that coal gas retains its flammability over time extremely well.The park rangers thought that the recent showers had done little to reduce the flammability of the grasslands.Concerns about the flammability of alcohol sanitizing gels led some hospitals to ban them.
